message:
Add energy refund mechanism and comprehensive fixes

Features:
- Energy refund: 20 energy back when LLM returns no new voices
- Backend returns metadata: new_voices_added field
- Frontend uses metadata for accurate refund logic

Fixes:
- Persistence bugs: conversations, voiceConfig serialization, energy on view switch
- Voice name mapping: user-defined names (e.g., "ÂêïÂ∏É") shown correctly
- Strict LLM prompt: prevents hallucinating new characters
- Writing area context: chat includes original text

Architecture:
- Stateful analyzer returns dict with voices + new_voices_added
- Frontend API updated to handle metadata
- Session isolation with TTL cleanup
